items.title: Work Permit Management System
items.description: Digitalization and centralization of the work permit request and validation process within a shopping mall.

role.description: My role in the project was as a Full Stack Developer; however, I had a stronger focus on frontend development and user experience implementation.
responsabilities: Design of the overall system architecture
Functional testing and training for operational staff

context: The project originated from the client’s need to digitalize and centralize the work permit management process within a shopping mall.

The client managed several shopping malls with multiple stores, each assigned to a responsible manager. Whenever extraordinary work was required in a store, the manager had to request authorization from the administration via email.
This manual process caused a lack of traceability, approval delays, and frequent operational and communication errors.
The system needed to allow tenants to request work permits for their stores and enable administrators to approve, reject, and track those requests through controlled, role-based workflows.
The project included requirements gathering, architecture and technology stack definition, development, internal and on-site testing with the client, documentation, and training for end users.

tecnical_challenges.description: The main challenge of the project was gaining a deep understanding of the client’s operation, terminology, and process variations, separating responsibilities by role and translating them into a clear, readable system that reacted dynamically to each user profile.
items: Clearly defining roles and permissions from the database layer to the frontend
Synchronizing permission authorization logic between backend and frontend
Ensuring that views, actions, and forms were dynamically enabled based on user role
Efficiently storing generated permits for later analysis

results.description: As a result, a platform and API were developed to receive, process, and store work permits categorized by shopping mall, store, responsible party, and permit type.
items: Significant reduction in administrative response times
Elimination of dependency on manual processes and email communication

items.title: Sistema para generación de boletas
items.description: Registro de entradas y salidas para vehículos de carga.
context: Proyecto orientado a digitalizar el registro de accesos, pesajes y salidas de vehículos de carga en una empresa de venta de material a granel. El proceso incluía múltiples pesajes por vehículo y se realizaba de forma manual en caseta. El sistema integra visión por computadora para identificar vehículos y registrar eventos automáticamente.

items.title: Aplicación de seguimiento de pruebas Romberg
items.description: Evaluación de estabilidad mediante visión por computadora.
context: Sistema desarrollado para estandarizar la evaluación de pruebas Romberg en operadores de una empresa de transporte de personal. El proceso previo era manual y dependía del criterio del personal médico, lo que generaba inconsistencias y falsos positivos. La solución guía al operador durante la evaluación mediante instrucciones visuales y auditivas, valida posturas mediante visión por computadora y determina el resultado con reglas predefinidas.
